product_name: MorpheCloudlight Soft Glow Veil Finishing Powder
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSet skin in its most flattering light, as if illuminated by a softly blurred, cloud-diffused glow. Morphe's Cloudlight Soft Glow Veil Finishing Powder features light-reflecting technology, infused with squalane, shea butter & hyaluronic acid. It sweeps on to finish your look with natural radiance.
details: DetailsFeaturesSheer, weightless multi-tone finishing powderSoftly sets & finishes your look with natural radianceOptically fades fine lines, wrinkles & poresKey IngredientsSqualane known to soften & smooth skinShea butter known to condition & soothe skinHyaluronic acid known to boost hydration and elasticityItem 2637305How To UseTo set foundation, apply powder over your complexion.To keep concealer in place, gently press and roll powder on top of concealer improving and extending the wear of your product.To brighten, delicately dust powder over the bridge of the nose, under eyes and on chin.IngredientsSunrise: Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, HDI/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Silica, Talc, Mica, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Triethylhexanoin, Sorbitan Stearate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, 1,2-Hexanediol, Dimethiconol, Phenoxyethanol, Dimethicone, Xanthan Gum, Polysorbate 80, Tocopheryl Acetate, Aminopropyl Triethoxysilane, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Lauroyl Lysine, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Aluminum Hydroxide, Tin Oxide, Sodium Hyaluronate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Squalane, Tocopherol. May Contain/Peut Contenir (+/-): Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Red 6 (CI 15850).
how_to_use: To set foundation, apply powder over your complexion.To keep concealer in place, gently press and roll powder on top of concealer improving and extending the wear of your product.To brighten, delicately dust powder over the bridge of the nose, under eyes and on chin.
ingredients: Tocopherol. May Contain/Peut Contenir (+/-): Titanium Dioxide (

reviews.headline: Lovely Product, but....
reviews.comments: I bought this powder and truly love it.  It gives your skin a soft healthy glow, no shimmer.  My problem with it was after a few weeks use, it cracked and started disintegrating.  Mind you, I did not drop it.  I find the packaging to be cheap and flimsy.  I am repurchasing and hope i do not have the same results because it truly is what I have been searching for in a finishing powder.

reviews.headline: This kicks Hourglass Ambient light products to the curb
reviews.comments:
I've wanted to try this, and when it arrived I thought, great, disco ball highlighter. Ugh. It is not at all what I first thought. I have fair, cool skin, green eyes, am 52, and the lightest shade is perfect on my skin tone. I used a big fluffy brush and dusted this across my cheekbones and was stunned. It's like having my own personal lighting studio. I feel like the heroine in a BBC historical production. It's absolutely gorgeous. Not a disco ball to be found.
I think it's not only better than anything Hourglass makes, but by far and away. Doesn't settle into lines, doesn't sparkle like a Cullen, just makes my skin look like I'm in candlelit perfection. I will buy and use this for as long as Morphe makes it. Run, don't walk, etc.

reviews.headline: Would definitely buy again
reviews.comments: I use for bronzer or along hairline, blush, down nose, perfect

reviews.headline: Favorite glowy finishing powder
reviews.comments: I bought this in the color Dawn it looks so gorgeous on the skin. It gives a glowy/dewy look without feeling greasy or being covered in glitter. It's more expensive than I would typically pay for a finishing powder but this is definitely worth it to me!

reviews.headline: Wow
reviews.comments: This was an impulse buy. I purchased the Coco one, because of the orange hints. Well, it was a tattoo dark for my complexion, I've been using this to set my cream bronzer. And it's amazing. Morphe has done it again.

reviews.headline: Not bad
reviews.comments: I like that this powder blurs lines and pores, and it doesn't look "dry" even as a powder. But if you don't swirl your brush just so, you can get a patch of orange that's kind of hard to blend out. I don't hate it.

reviews.headline: love love love
reviews.comments: I never write reviews but I had to come for this product.  I dont typically wear any sort of setting powder but saw this on display and thought it looked so pretty and purchased on a whim.  What a beautiful surprise! I've never loved a powder the way I do this one - it actually sets without feeling dry and blurs to such a natural, glowy finish.  Highly recommend!  New holy grail

reviews.headline: Best product ever
reviews.comments: Love the shade, glides on so smoothly, great product

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: The powder goes on smoothly and makes my face radiant.  It doesn't settle in my creases.

reviews.headline: Well I'm shocked
reviews.comments: This is so good. I'm 46, in perimenopause and I stopped wearing most powder 3 years ago. I do NOT like the shimmery or dewy look. It emphasizes every line and wrinkle. I do like glow though. Ive been looking for a reasonably priced powder like this that only gives glow but ACTUALLY does some blurring without showing texture. It's super fine. I do not use much, very little and only in certain areas. But it leaves a beautiful finish. It doesn't look powdery at all.

reviews.headline: Just the right amount of coverage.
reviews.comments:
Love this stuff. So hard to find a good compact powder that gives a decent coverage w/o looking cakey.

I dont even use my baking powder anymore.

reviews.headline: Great powder!
reviews.comments: I had been struggling to find a good powder that didn't disturb my makeup, look cakey, or too matte. This is a perfect powder for all those problems. The finish is very smooth and light weight. It looks stunning all over the face!

reviews.headline: I'm In Love!
reviews.comments: I bought the two lightest colors. I use the pink swirl to set under eyes and the T-zone and use the sunrise yellow swirl to give a bronze effect to forehead and contour nose and chin. It blends out nicely and adds a subtle glow. I have mature combination skin and this is the best powdered product I have ever used and it last through out the day. It's so soft and blurs my textured skin while reducing redness. Highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Shine Baby Shine
reviews.comments: This highlight EASILY just became my new favorite! It pairs so well with any color blush and it gives the right amount of glow to make your skin look radiant! Yes please!

reviews.headline: AMAZING
reviews.comments: This powder works better on my skin than any other powder I've ever used. I love the way my face looks when I use this! I rarely write reviews but had to for this product!

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: Ive been looking for a subtle highlight for quite awhile. I happened to stumble upon this and I love it! Not only does it give a soft glow, it also seem to blur any imperfections.

reviews.headline: Prism Libre pressed was not available
reviews.comments: So I wanted to get my hands on prism libre pressed and it just was never available so I thought I'd try this out in the meantime. Well it's sooo good I got 3 different colors!! I LOVE IT!

reviews.headline: Looooooveeee so perfect for normal/oily skin types!
reviews.comments: So in love with this product. It gives me the perfect sparkle/glow without the greasy glossy look! For reference, I use Milk pore-mattifying primer + blurring underneath and L'oreal Instant Perfect primer under my eyes and T-zone but I can also wear JUST this powder to get that perfect light coverage that makes me look awake (even when I'm not haha)

reviews.headline: Lovely powder
reviews.comments: This powder is amazing! I use it to set my makeup and it leaves this beautiful suble glow on the skin. It is so beautiful.

reviews.headline: Look radiant
reviews.comments: Love this powder, it makes more mature skin look supple and glow.

faceoff_positive.comments:
The Cloudlight Soft Glow Veil - Dawn is a truly captivating product that combines elegance and serenity. From the moment you apply it, a delicate, soft glow envelops the skin, creating a luminous, almost ethereal effect. The "Dawn" in its name perfectly captures the essence of a new beginning ‚Äî a soft, radiant light that makes the skin appear fresh and rejuvenated.

The texture of the veil is light and airy, almost like a cloud, which means it doesn't feel heavy or greasy. It glides on smoothly, providing just the right amount of illumination without being overwhelming. The product is perfect for those who want to enhance their natural radiance subtly. It can be worn alone for a fresh, dewy look or layered under makeup for a glow that lasts all day.

One of the most impressive qualities of the Cloudlight Soft Glow Veil is how it adapts to various skin tones. The glow it provides is universally flattering and leaves a soft, diffused sheen that mimics the soft warmth of dawn light.

In terms of fragrance, it carries a light, fresh scent that adds a layer of sophistication without overpowering. The subtle aroma is a perfect balance, offering a gentle sensory experience without being too intrusive.

Pros:

Beautiful, subtle glow
Lightweight and non-greasy
Universally flattering
Light, pleasant fragrance
Ideal for both everyday use and special occasions
Cons:

Some may find the glow a bit too subtle if they're looking for a more intense highlight.
Final Verdict: Overall, the Cloudlight Soft Glow Veil - Dawn is a stunning product for anyone who loves a natural, radiant look. Its delicate glow and versatile finish make it a must-have in your beauty routine, adding just the right amount of luminosity to your skin. It's a soft, dewy veil that's perfect for bringing out your inner glow, just like the soft light of dawn.
faceoff_positive.headline: Very captivating

faceoff_negative.comments: First of all, this product is beautiful to look at and to display. The packaging is beautiful, high quality, and has a futuristic feel. Now for the actual product, just know this is not a highlighter. The glow provided by this product is very soft and subtle. Instead of a shimmer, it's more like a glowy powder, so getting your shade match is important. I got the closest to my shade and it still was not the best fit for my undertones. The formula itself though is soft and velvety. It also does sit will on the skin. I would have rated this higher if it looked better on my skin tone.
faceoff_negative.headline: Soft Glow
